SELECT B.COMP_CD, C.COMP_NAME, D.ITEM_CD, D.ITEM_NAME, B.PRODUCT_QTY, TO_CHAR(B.PLAN_DT, 'DD') AS PLAN_DT FROM TB_PARTNER_ITEM A LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCT_INFO B ON A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND A.COMP_CD = B.COMP_CD LEFT JOIN TB_PARTNER_INFO C ON A.COMP_CD = C.COMP_CD LEFT JOIN TB_ITEM_INFO D ON A.ITEM_CD = D.ITEM_CD WHERE TO_CHAR(B.PLAN_DT, 'YY/MM') = #{planDt}
AND A.COMP_CD = #{compCd}

SELECT A.ITEM_CD, C.ITEM_NAME, (SELECT COM_NAME FROM TB_COM_CODE WHERE COM_GRP_CD = 'IT03' AND C.BOX_TYPE = COM_CD) AS BOX_TYPE, C.BOX_QTY, C.WEIGHT, B.PLAN_QTY, D.PRODUCT_QTY, D.USER_ID FROM TB_PARTNER_ITEM A LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM TB_PLAN_INFO WHERE PLAN_DT LIKE '%' || #{planDt} || '%') B ON A.COMP_CD = B.COMP_CD AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD LEFT JOIN TB_ITEM_INFO C ON A.ITEM_CD = C.ITEM_CD LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCT_INFO D ON A.COMP_CD = D.COMP_CD AND C.ITEM_CD = D.ITEM_CD AND D.PLAN_DT = #{planDt} WHERE A.COMP_CD = #{compCd}
